Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.core
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.similarity

Class PairwiseResnikSimilarity

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.similarity.PairwiseResnikSimilarity
All Implemented Interfaces:
PairwiseSimilarity
public final class PairwiseResnikSimilarity extends Object implements PairwiseSimilarity
Implementation of pairwise Resnik similarity without precomputation.

This lies at the core of most of of the more computationally expensive pairwise similarities' computations. See PrecomputingPairwiseResnikSimilarity for a variant where the similarity scores can be precomputed and serialized.

Author:
Manuel Holtgrewe, Sebastian Koehler
